author: potuz
content: What is the tool recommended to generate a top-up deposit for a compounding validator. The ethereum launchpad now points to ethstaker's deposit-cli which doesn't list the contributors in the github. The previous `staking-deposit-cli` doesn't really list top ups. `ethdo` used to do this so I assume that still works. Anything else? The signature is irrelevant for this so perhaps I'll do it myself, I guess the only thing is computing the sha of the ssz for the depositdata. I'm surprised that a quick google search did not find many results, surprisingly enough this still open issue by Hsiao-Wei https://github.com/ethereum/staking-deposit-cli/issues/39.

author: potuz
content: yeah I think it'll be faster and I'll feel safer if I write my own, it should take just a few minutes

content: I wrote mine in typescript, I gave up on Python. I dislike UIs but I think this should be in the launchpad itself. I really think the community wants this instead of having to rely on coding this. Not sure who runs the launchpad, <@550420431744794624> you used to have something to do with this do you know?
